name: Deseret Nation
declaringWar: I don't enjoy killing, but when done righteously, it's just a chore like any other.
attacked: God willing, you will not leave this valley.
defeated: Yea, we wept when we remembered Zion. But your time will come.
introduction: It's good to meet you. Welcome to Deseret. If you shall be a good neighbor and treat us with brotherly respect, we shall do so in turn.
hateHello: If you harm any of my people, I will find you. Make no mistake.
tradeRequest: We are happy to share with you any supplies you might need.
uniques: [-25]% Faith cost of generating Great Prophet equivalents
May choose 1 additional belief(s) of any type when founding a religion
Empire enters golden age <upon gaining a [Living Prophet] unit>

name: Venice Beach
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: A wrong calculation, on my part.

name: Issaquah Nation
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: The spirts will fight at our side.
defeated: We go to join the ancestors.

name: Carbon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.
